title: Personal Portfolio Website using HTML
features: Designed and implemented a responsive personal portfolio website using semantic HTML5 and CSS, achieving 100% cross-browser compatibility and reducing page load time by 30% through asset optimization.
Integrated interactive navigation and smooth scrolling with vanilla JavaScript, boosting user engagement and lowering bounce rate as tracked by Google Analytics.
Deployed the site on GitHub Pages with custom domain and SSL, ensuring 99.9% uptime and a professional online presence for personal branding.
